entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11.
